attributes.action: Overhaul the junction 3 of the M3 to improve traffic flow at peak times
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Junction 3 of the M3 is a major bottleneck for drivers using the A322 between West End and the M3 junction at peak time. 

Due to the congestion at peak times people are performing u-turns on the dual carriageway which is a hazard for drivers on the West End bound carriageway. There has already been 3 deaths in one accident due to this stupidity. 

In addition, stone, mud and water is dragged on to the carriageway which could cause other accidents.
